_header: Hail maiden and wife hail widow bright
Subjects: saints, hymns to; hymns, to saints; Bridget, saint
_description: John Audelay, ‘Salutacio Sancte Brigitte’ — twenty-three 9-line stanzas

BodDou302.First Lines:
hayle maydyn & wyfe hayle wedow brygyttHayle þou chese to
                    be chast & kepe charyte…
BodDou302.Last Lines:
…Heo graunt ȝoue grace þat beþ presentTo haue
                    ioy & blis perpetualy
BodDou302.Attributed Title:
Hic incipit salutacio Sancte Brigitte virginis et quomodo dominus ihesus
                        christus Apparuit illi corporaliter et dedit illa suam benedictionem quod
                        Awdelay (f. 25)

                        ed.
